participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and a bit anxious, especially about her new life changes as a mother.
participant_1.background: i am pregnant with my first child. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. i live with my husband in pennsylvania.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Active and supportive, always trying to balance work and family life.
participant_2.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i'm married to a doctor. i live in a three storey house.
